Uses of Class
arena.core.OutOfBoundsException

    • Uses of OutOfBoundsException in arena.core

      Methods in arena.core that throw OutOfBoundsException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Vector2[] GameUtility.calculatePath(int startX, int startY, int destinationX, int destinationY)
      Returns the path as an array of tile positions that are taken to reach the destination position.
      Vector2 GameUtility.findFurthest(int x, int y, GameState.EntityType criterion)
      Finds and returns the position of the furthest entity as specified by criterion.
      Vector2 GameUtility.findNearest(int x, int y, GameState.EntityType criterion)
      Finds and returns the position of the nearest entity as specified by criterion.
      GameState.EntityType GameState.getEntityAt(int x, int y)
      Returns the entity type at the specified position.
      boolean GameUtility.haveLineOfSight(int startX, int startY, int destinationX, int destinationY)
      Returns true if the start tile has a line of sight towards the destination tile.
      boolean GameState.isEmpty(int x, int y)
      Checks if the coordinate specified contains no entities (GameState.EntityType.Empty).
      boolean GameState.isFriendlyPlayer(int x, int y)
      Checks if the coordinate specified contains a friendly player (GameState.EntityType.Player).
      boolean GameState.isFriendlyProjectile(int x, int y)
      Checks if the coordinate specified contains a friendly projectile (GameState.EntityType.Projectile).
      boolean GameState.isHealthPack(int x, int y)
      Checks if the coordinate specified contains a health pack (GameState.EntityType.HealthPack).
      boolean GameState.isHostilePlayer(int x, int y)
      Checks if the coordinate specified contains a hostile player (GameState.EntityType.Player).
      boolean GameState.isHostileProjectile(int x, int y)
      Checks if the coordinate specified contains a hostile projectile (GameState.EntityType.Projectile).
      boolean GameState.isMine(int x, int y)
      Checks if the coordinate specified contains a mine (GameState.EntityType.Mine).
      boolean GameState.isPlayer(int x, int y)
      Checks if the coordinate specified contains any player (GameState.EntityType.Player).
      boolean GameState.isProjectile(int x, int y)
      Checks if the coordinate specified contains any projectile (GameState.EntityType.Projectile).
      boolean GameUtility.isReachable(int startX, int startY, int destinationX, int destinationY)
      Returns true if the tile at the specified position is reachable via path-finding, false otherwise.
      boolean GameState.isStorm(int x, int y)
      Checks if the coordinate specified contains the storm (GameState.EntityType.Storm).
      boolean GameUtility.isWalkable(int x, int y)
      Returns true if the tile at the specified position is walkable by players and projectiles, false otherwise.
      boolean GameState.isWall(int x, int y)
      Checks if the coordinate specified contains a wall (GameState.EntityType.Wall).
      boolean GameUtility.isWithinStorm(int x, int y, int stormSize)
      Checks if the specified position is within the storm, given a storm size.
      Action GameUtility.moveTowards(int destinationX, int destinationY)
      Returns an action that moves the player to the specified location; if there is no path, it will return Action.NoAction.
